info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 6:43PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lea and northwestern Gaines Counties through 730 PM CDT/630 PM MDT/... At 643 PM CDT/543 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monument, or 12 miles southwest of Hobbs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hobbs, Monument, Humble City, Knowles, Lea County Regional Airport, Industrial Airpark, Oil Center and Higginbotham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT/1000 PM MDT/ for southeastern New Mexico...and western Texas.
